commandDescription: Compares aggregate permisisons from source list against and target list writing higher permissions contained in target list to stdout
permsetsourceFlagDescription: Source list of permission set files to be compared against target (use permission set names when using -g or -d); list is comma separated
permsettargetFlagDescription: Target list of permission set files to be compared against target (use permission set names when using -g or -d); list is comma separated
getorgFlagDescription: look for permission sets on Salesforce org
getpermsdirFlagDescription: look for permission sets in the sfdx project permissions folder
tofileFlagDescription: write differences to file in xml format
logMergeActionConvert: *** merge: converting profile to permission set prior to merge
errorPermSetDoesNotExist: Permission set not found on Org '%s'.
errorPermSetFileDoesNotExist: Permission set not found in SFDX project permissions folder '%s'.
errorInvalidXMLFormat: Invalid XML format. Not valid Salesforce permission set metadata '%s'.
